## types.KebabCase type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type KebabCase<S extends string> = S extends `${infer First}${infer REST}` ? REST extends Uncapitalize<REST> ? `${Lowercase<First>}${KebabCase<REST>}` : `${Lowercase<First>}-${KebabCase<REST>}` : S;
```
